Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ApplicationAware
    please use ApplicationAware instead
    org.apache.struts2.interceptor.CookiesAware
    please use CookiesAware instead
    org.apache.struts2.interceptor.HttpParametersAware
    please use ParametersAware instead
    org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ParameterAware
    please use ParametersAware instead
    org.apache.struts2.interceptor.PrincipalAware
    please use PrincipalAware instead
    org.apache.struts2.interceptor.RequestAware
    please use ParametersAware instead
    org.apache.struts2.util.ServletContextAware
    please use ServletContextAware instead
    org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletRequestAware
    please use ServletRequestAware instead
    org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletResponseAware
    please use ServletResponseAware instead
    org.apache.struts2.interceptor.SessionAware
    use SessionAware
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.util.reflection.ReflectionProviderFactory
    inject RefectionProvider directly
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.inject.util.Strings
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionContext.ACTION_INVOCATION
    scope will be narrowed to "private", use helper methods instead
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionContext.ACTION_NAME
    scope will be narrowed to "private", use helper methods instead
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionContext.APPLICATION
    scope will be narrowed to "private", use helper methods instead
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionContext.CONTAINER
    scope will be narrowed to "private", use helper methods instead
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionContext.CONVERSION_ERRORS
    scope will be narrowed to "private", use helper methods instead
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionContext.LOCALE
    scope will be narrowed to "private", use helper methods instead
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionContext.PARAMETERS
    scope will be narrowed to "private", use helper methods instead
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionContext.SESSION
    scope will be narrowed to "private", use helper methods instead
    org.apache.struts2.StrutsConstants.STRUTS_ENABLE_OGNL_EVAL_EXPRESSION
    as of 6.0.0. Use StrutsConstants.STRUTS_OGNL_ENABLE_EVAL_EXPRESSION instead.
    org.apache.struts2.StrutsConstants.STRUTS_ENABLE_OGNL_EXPRESSION_CACHE
    as of 6.0.0. Use StrutsConstants.STRUTS_OGNL_ENABLE_EXPRESSION_CACHE instead.
    org.apache.struts2.StrutsConstants.STRUTS_LOG_MISSING_PROPERTIES
    as of 6.0.0. Use StrutsConstants.STRUTS_OGNL_LOG_MISSING_PROPERTIES instead.
    org.apache.struts2.StrutsConstants.STRUTS_MAPPER_ACTION_PREFIX_CROSSNAMESPACES
    it will be removed soon, please refactor your application
    org.apache.struts2.StrutsConstants.STRUTS_OBJECTFACTORY_SPRING_ENABLE_AOP_SUPPORT
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.conversion.TypeConverter.TYPE_CONVERTER_CONTEXT_KEY
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionContext.VALUE_STACK
    scope will be narrowed to "private", use helper methods instead
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.apache.struts2.interceptor.csp.CspSettings.addCspHeaders(HttpServletResponse)
    use CspSettings.addCspHeaders(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) instead
    org.apache.struts2.views.util.UrlHelper.buildParametersString(Map<String, Object>, StringBuilder, String)
    since Struts 6.1.0, use QueryStringBuilder instead
    org.apache.struts2.views.util.DefaultUrlHelper.buildParametersString(Map<String, Object>, StringBuilder, String)
    since Struts 6.1.0, use QueryStringBuilder instead
    org.apache.struts2.views.util.DefaultUrlHelper.buildParametersString(Map<String, Object>, StringBuilder, String, boolean)
    since Struts 6.1.0, use DefaultUrlHelper.buildParametersString(Map, StringBuilder, String)
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.inject.util.Strings.capitalize(String)
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.util.StrutsLocalizedTextProvider.clearDefaultResourceBundles()
    used only in tests
    org.apache.struts2.views.util.DefaultUrlHelper.decode(String)
    since 6.1.0, use UrlDecoder directly, use Inject to inject a proper instance
    org.apache.struts2.views.util.DefaultUrlHelper.decode(String, boolean)
    since 6.1.0, use UrlDecoder directly, use Inject to inject a proper instance
    org.apache.struts2.views.util.DefaultUrlHelper.encode(String)
    since 6.1.0, use UrlEncoder directly, use Inject to inject a proper instance
    org.apache.struts2.ServletActionContext.getContext()
    Use ServletActionContext.getActionContext() instead
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.util.StrutsLocalizedTextProvider.localeFromString(String, Locale)
    please use LocaleUtils.toLocale(String)
    org.apache.struts2.views.util.UrlHelper.parseQueryString(String, boolean)
    since 6.1.0, use QueryStringParser directly, use Inject to inject a proper instance
    org.apache.struts2.views.util.DefaultUrlHelper.parseQueryString(String, boolean)
    since 6.1.0, use QueryStringParser directly, use Inject to inject a proper instance
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionContext.setActionInvocation(ActionInvocation)
    use ActionContext.withActionInvocation(ActionInvocation) instead
    org.apache.struts2.dispatcher.mapper.DefaultActionMapper.setAllowActionCrossNamespaceAccess(String)
    since 6.1.0 - please refactor your application to avoid using this functionality
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionContext.setApplication(Map<String, Object>)
    use ActionContext.withApplication(Map) instead
    org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ApplicationAware.setApplication(Map<String, Object>)
    please use ApplicationAware.withApplication(Map) instead
    org.apache.struts2.views.jsp.ui.AbstractUITag.setClass(String)
    Use AbstractUITag.setCssClass(String) instead
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionContext.setContainer(Container)
    use ActionContext.withContainer(Container) instead
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionContext.setConversionErrors(Map<String, ConversionData>)
    use ActionContext.withConversionErrors(Map) instead
    org.apache.struts2.interceptor.CookiesAware.setCookiesMap(Map<String, String>)
    please use CookiesAware.withCookies(Map) instead
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionContext.setLocale(Locale)
    use ActionContext.withLocale(Locale) instead
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionContext.setName(String)
    use ActionContext.withActionName(String) instead
    org.apache.struts2.interceptor.HttpParametersAware.setParameters(HttpParameters)
    please use ParametersAware.withParameters(HttpParameters) instead
    org.apache.struts2.interceptor.PrincipalAware.setPrincipalProxy(PrincipalProxy)
    please use PrincipalAware.withPrincipalProxy(PrincipalProxy) instead
    org.apache.struts2.interceptor.RequestAware.setRequest(Map<String, Object>)
    please use ParametersAware.withParameters(HttpParameters) instead
    org.apache.struts2.util.ServletContextAware.setServletContext(ServletContext)
    please use ServletContextAware.withServletContext(ServletContext) instead
    org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletRequestAware.setServletRequest(HttpServletRequest)
    please use ServletRequestAware.withServletRequest(HttpServletRequest)
    org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletResponseAware.setServletResponse(HttpServletResponse)
    please use ServletResponseAware.withServletResponse(HttpServletResponse) instead
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionContext.setSession(Map<String, Object>)
    use ActionContext.withSession(Map) instead
    org.apache.struts2.interceptor.SessionAware.setSession(Map<String, Object>)
    please use SessionAware.withSession(Map)
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionContext.setValueStack(ValueStack)
    Use ActionContext.withValueStack(ValueStack) instead
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.config.impl.AbstractMatcher(PatternMatcher<?>)
    use @{link AbstractMatcher.AbstractMatcher(PatternMatcher, boolean) instead
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.validator.DelegatingValidatorContext(Class)
    will be removed, do not use!
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.ognl.OgnlUtil()
    It is recommended to utilize the {@link OgnlUtil#OgnlUtil(com.opensymphony.xwork2.ognl.ExpressionCacheFactory, com.opensymphony.xwork2.ognl.BeanInfoCacheFactory) method instead.
    org.apache.struts2.config.StrutsXmlConfigurationProvider(boolean)
